Layout/SpaceInsideHashLiteralBraces.description:
Description

Use spaces inside hash literal braces - or don't.
Layout/SpaceInsideHashLiteralBraces.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: space (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['space', 'no_space', 'compact'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyleForEmptyBraces: no_space (type: str)
SupportedStylesForEmptyBraces: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
